abstract: Elizabeth Winship, who for 35 years wrote Ask Beth advice column for Boston Globe, dies at age 90.
snippet: Thousands of youngsters — and sometimes their befuddled parents — sent letters to Mrs. Winship, seeking her solid, sympathetic and often witty advice.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of youngsters — and sometimes their befuddled parents — sent letters to Mrs. Winship, seeking her solid, sympathetic and often witty advice.

headline.main: Elizabeth Winship Dies at 90; Advised Youths in ‘Ask Beth’
headline.print_headline: Elizabeth Winship, 90; Advised Youths in ‘Ask Beth’
headline.seo: Elizabeth Winship, Advice Columnist for Youths, Dies at 90
